verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe בָּנִ֤ים <S%H1121><s%> children סֽוֹרְרִים֙ <S%H5637><s%> to the rebellious נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that take עֵצָה֙ <S%H6098><s%> counsel וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not מִנִּ֔י <S%H4480><s%> Mine וְלִנְסֹ֥ךְ <S%H5258><s%> but not of me and that cover מַסֵּכָ֖ה <S%H4541><s%> with a covering וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> but not of my spirit לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order סְפ֥וֹת <S%H5595><s%> that they may add חַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> sin עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto חַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> to sin

הַהֹלְכִים֙ <S%H1980><s%> That walk לָרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> to go down מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וּפִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> at my mouth לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Without שָׁאָ֑לוּ <S%H7592><s%> and have not asked לָעוֹז֙ <S%H5810><s%> to strengthen בְּמָע֣וֹז <S%H4581><s%> themselves in the strength פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh וְלַחְס֖וֹת <S%H2620><s%> and to trust בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> in the shadow מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֛ם מָע֥וֹז <S%H4581><s%> Therefore shall the strength פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh לְבֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> be your shame וְהֶחָס֥וּת <S%H2622><s%> and the trust בְּצֵל־ <S%H6738><s%> in the shadow מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לִכְלִמָּֽה׃ <S%H3639><s%> [your] confusion

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> are at בְצֹ֖עַן <S%H6814><s%> were at Zoan שָׂרָ֑יו <S%H8269><s%> For his princes וּמַלְאָכָ֖יו <S%H4397><s%> and his ambassadors חָנֵ֥ס <S%H2609><s%> to Hanes יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> came

כֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> Everyone [הִבְאִישׁ כ] (הֹבִ֔ישׁ <S%H887><s%> loathsome ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> of a people לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> cannot יוֹעִ֣ילוּ <S%H3276><s%> [that] could not profit לָ֑מוֹ לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> cannot לְעֵ֙זֶר֙ <S%H5828><s%> them nor be an help וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> cannot לְהוֹעִ֔יל <S%H3276><s%> nor profit כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לְבֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> but a shame וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also לְחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> and also a reproach ס

מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden בַּהֲמ֣וֹת <S%H929><s%> of the beasts נֶ֑גֶב <S%H5045><s%> of the south בְּאֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> into the land צָרָ֨ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble וְצוּקָ֜ה <S%H6695><s%> and anguish לָבִ֧יא <S%H3833><s%> from whence [come] the young וָלַ֣יִשׁ <S%H3918><s%> and old lion מֵהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> where אֶפְעֶה֙ <S%H660><s%> the viper וְשָׂרָ֣ף <S%H8314><s%> serpent מְעוֹפֵ֔ף <S%H5774><s%> flying יִשְׂאוּ֩ <S%H5375><s%> they will carry עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> upon the shoulders עֲיָרִ֜ים <S%H5895><s%> of young asses חֵֽילֵהֶ֗ם <S%H2428><s%> their riches וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and דַּבֶּ֤שֶׁת <S%H1707><s%> upon the bunches גְּמַלִּים֙ <S%H1581><s%> of camels אֽוֹצְרֹתָ֔ם <S%H214><s%> and their treasures עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto עַ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> to a people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> cannot יוֹעִֽילוּ׃ <S%H3276><s%> [that] shall not profit

וּמִצְרַ֕יִם <S%H4714><s%> For the Egyptians הֶ֥בֶל <S%H1892><s%> in vain וָרִ֖יק <S%H7385><s%> and to no purpose יַעְזֹ֑רוּ <S%H5826><s%> shall help לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore קָרָ֣אתִי <S%H7121><s%> therefore have I cried לָזֹ֔את <S%H2063><s%> concerning this רַ֥הַב <S%H7293><s%> strength הֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> Their שָֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H7674><s%> [is] to sit still

עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> Now go כָתְבָ֥הּ <S%H3789><s%> write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on ל֛וּחַ <S%H3871><s%> it before them in a table אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> before וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> it in a book חֻקָּ֑הּ <S%H2710><s%> and note וּתְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> may serve לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that it may be for the time אַחֲר֔וֹן <S%H314><s%> to come לָעַ֖ד <S%H5707><s%> witness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> and ever

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> people מְרִי֙ <S%H4805><s%> That this [is] a rebellious ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> this בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children כֶּחָשִׁ֑ים <S%H3586><s%> lying בָּנִ֕ים <S%H1121><s%> children לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָב֥וּ <S%H14><s%> [that] will שְׁמ֖וֹעַ <S%H8085><s%> not hear תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Who אָמְר֤וּ <S%H559><s%> Which say לָֽרֹאִים֙ <S%H7200><s%> to the seers לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> must not תִרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> See וְלַ֣חֹזִ֔ים <S%H2374><s%> not and to the prophets לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> must not תֶחֱזוּ־ <S%H2372><s%> Prophesy לָ֖נוּ נְכֹח֑וֹת <S%H5229><s%> not unto us right things דַּבְּרוּ־ <S%H1696><s%> speak לָ֣נוּ חֲלָק֔וֹת <S%H2513><s%> unto us smooth things חֲז֖וּ <S%H4123><s%> deceits מַהֲתַלּֽוֹת׃ <S%H2372><s%> prophesy

ס֚וּרוּ <S%H5493><s%> Get you out מִנֵּי־ <S%H4480><s%> out דֶ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> of the way הַטּ֖וּ <S%H5186><s%> turn aside מִנֵּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from אֹ֑רַח <S%H734><s%> out of the path הַשְׁבִּ֥יתוּ <S%H7673><s%> to cease מִפָּנֵ֖ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> from before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> cause the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Wherefore thus saith קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יַ֥עַן <S%H3282><s%> Since מָֽאָסְכֶ֖ם <S%H3988><s%> Because ye despise בַּדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַֽתִּבְטְחוּ֙ <S%H982><s%> and trust בְּעֹ֣שֶׁק <S%H6233><s%> in oppression וְנָל֔וֹז <S%H3868><s%> and perverseness וַתִּֽשָּׁעֲנ֖וּ <S%H8172><s%> and stay עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶם֙ הֶעָוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> Therefore this iniquity הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> shall be to you as a breach נֹפֵ֔ל <S%H5307><s%> ready to fall נִבְעֶ֖ה <S%H1158><s%> swelling out בְּחוֹמָ֣ה <S%H2346><s%> wall נִשְׂגָּבָ֑ה <S%H7682><s%> in a high אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> Whose פִּתְאֹ֥ם <S%H6597><s%> suddenly לְפֶ֖תַע <S%H6621><s%> at an instant יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh שִׁבְרָֽהּ׃ <S%H7667><s%> whose breaking

וּ֠שְׁבָרָהּ <S%H7665><s%> And he shall break כְּשֵׁ֨בֶר <S%H7667><s%> it as the breaking נֵ֧בֶל <S%H5035><s%> vessel יוֹצְרִ֛ים <S%H3335><s%> of the potters' כָּת֖וּת <S%H3807><s%> that is broken in pieces לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יַחְמֹ֑ל <S%H2550><s%> he shall not spare וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> so that there shall not be found בִמְכִתָּתוֹ֙ <S%H4386><s%> in the bursting חֶ֔רֶשׂ <S%H2789><s%> of it a sherd לַחְתּ֥וֹת <S%H2846><s%> to take אֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> fire מִיָּק֔וּד <S%H3344><s%> from the hearth וְלַחְשֹׂ֥ף <S%H2834><s%> or to take מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water מִגֶּֽבֶא׃ <S%H1360><s%> [withal] out of the pit פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַר֩ <S%H559><s%> For thus saith אֲדֹנָ֨י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD קְד֣וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּשׁוּבָ֤ה <S%H7729><s%> In returning וָנַ֙חַת֙ <S%H5183><s%> and rest תִּוָּ֣שֵׁע֔וּן <S%H3467><s%> shall ye be saved בְּהַשְׁקֵט֙ <S%H8252><s%> in quietness וּבְבִטְחָ֔ה <S%H985><s%> and in confidence תִּֽהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become גְּבֽוּרַתְכֶ֑ם <S%H1369><s%> shall be your strength וְלֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> were not אֲבִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H14><s%> and ye would

וַתֹּ֨אמְר֥וּ <S%H559><s%> But ye said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No כִ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on ס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> upon horses נָנ֖וּס <S%H5127><s%> No for we will flee עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תְּנוּס֑וּן <S%H5127><s%> therefore shall ye flee וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַ֣ל <S%H7031><s%> upon the swift נִרְכָּ֔ב <S%H7392><s%> and We will ride עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִקַּ֥לּוּ <S%H7043><s%> you be swift רֹדְפֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7291><s%> therefore shall they that pursue

אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> One מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> [shall flee] at גַּעֲרַ֣ת <S%H1606><s%> the rebuke אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> of one מִפְּנֵ֛י <S%H6440><s%> at גַּעֲרַ֥ת <S%H1606><s%> the rebuke חֲמִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H2568><s%> of five תָּנֻ֑סוּ <S%H5127><s%> shall ye flee עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> against אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo נוֹתַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H3498><s%> till ye be left כַּתֹּ֙רֶן֙ <S%H8650><s%> as a beacon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top הָהָ֔ר <S%H2022><s%> of a mountain וְכַנֵּ֖ס <S%H5251><s%> and as an ensign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגִּבְעָֽה׃ <S%H1389><s%> on an hill

וְלָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יְחַכֶּ֤ה <S%H2442><s%> wait יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And therefore will the LORD לַֽחֲנַנְכֶ֔ם <S%H2603><s%> that he may be gracious וְלָכֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> and therefore יָר֖וּם <S%H7311><s%> unto you and therefore will he be exalted לְרַֽחֶמְכֶ֑ם <S%H7355><s%> that he may have mercy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is a אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> [is] a God מִשְׁפָּט֙ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> upon you for the LORD אַשְׁרֵ֖י <S%H835><s%> blessed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> are all ח֥וֹכֵי <S%H2442><s%> [are] all they that wait לֽוֹ׃ ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> O עַ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> For the people בְּצִיּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion יֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> shall dwell בִּירֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem בָּכ֣וֹ <S%H1058><s%> thou shalt weep לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִבְכֶּ֗ה <S%H1058><s%> no more חָנ֤וֹן <S%H2603><s%> he will be very יָחְנְךָ֙ <S%H2603><s%> gracious לְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto thee at the voice זַעֲקֶ֔ךָ <S%H2201><s%> cry כְּשָׁמְעָת֖וֹ <S%H8085><s%> when he shall hear עָנָֽךְ׃ <S%H6030><s%> it he will answer

וְנָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> give לָכֶ֧ם אֲדֹנָ֛י <S%H136><s%> And [though] the Lord לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> you the bread צָ֖ר <S%H6862><s%> of adversity וּמַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> and the water לָ֑חַץ <S%H3906><s%> of affliction וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִכָּנֵ֥ף <S%H3670><s%> be removed into a corner עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer מוֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H3384><s%> yet shall not thy teachers וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵינֶ֖יךָ <S%H5869><s%> any more but thine eyes רֹא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> shall see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3384><s%> thy teachers

וְאָזְנֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H241><s%> And thine ears תִּשְׁמַ֣עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> shall hear דָבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> a word מֵֽאַחֲרֶ֖יךָ <S%H310><s%> behind לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> thee saying זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> This [is] the way לְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> walk ב֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> whenever תַאֲמִ֖ינוּ <S%H541><s%> when ye turn to the right hand וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> whenever תַשְׂמְאִֽילוּ׃ <S%H8041><s%> and when ye turn to the left

וְטִמֵּאתֶ֗ם <S%H2930><s%> Ye shall defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִפּוּי֙ <S%H6826><s%> also the covering פְּסִילֵ֣י <S%H6456><s%> of thy graven images כַסְפֶּ֔ךָ <S%H3701><s%> of silver וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲפֻדַּ֖ת <S%H642><s%> and the ornament מַסֵּכַ֣ת <S%H4541><s%> of thy molten images זְהָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H2091><s%> of gold תִּזְרֵם֙ <S%H2219><s%> thou shalt cast them away כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> as דָוָ֔ה <S%H1739><s%> as a menstruous cloth צֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> unto it Get thee hence תֹּ֥אמַר <S%H559><s%> thou shalt say לֽוֹ׃

וְנָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> Then shall he give מְטַ֨ר <S%H4306><s%> the rain זַרְעֲךָ֜ <S%H2233><s%> of thy seed אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תִּזְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> that thou shalt sow אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲדָמָ֗ה <S%H127><s%> the ground וְלֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> withal and bread תְּבוּאַ֣ת <S%H8393><s%> of the increase הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָשֵׁ֖ן <S%H1879><s%> and it shall be fat וְשָׁמֵ֑ן <S%H8082><s%> and plenteous יִרְעֶ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> feed מִקְנֶ֛יךָ <S%H4735><s%> shall thy cattle בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כַּ֥ר <S%H3733><s%> pastures נִרְחָֽב׃ <S%H7337><s%> in large

וְהָאֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H504><s%> The oxen וְהָעֲיָרִ֗ים <S%H5895><s%> likewise and the young asses עֹֽבְדֵי֙ <S%H5647><s%> that ear הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> the ground בְּלִ֥יל <S%H1098><s%> provender חָמִ֖יץ <S%H2548><s%> clean יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> shall eat אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which זֹרֶ֥ה <S%H2219><s%> which hath been winnowed בָרַ֖חַת <S%H7371><s%> with the shovel וּבַמִּזְרֶֽה׃ <S%H4214><s%> and with the fan

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain גָּבֹ֗הַ <S%H1364><s%> And there shall be upon every high וְעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <S%H1389><s%> hill נִשָּׂאָ֔ה <S%H5375><s%> and upon every high פְּלָגִ֖ים <S%H6388><s%> rivers יִבְלֵי־ <S%H2988><s%> [and] streams מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of waters בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> in the day הֶ֣רֶג <S%H2027><s%> slaughter רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> of the great בִּנְפֹ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> fall מִגְדָּלִֽים׃ <S%H4026><s%> when the towers

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become אוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> Moreover the light הַלְּבָנָה֙ <S%H3842><s%> of the moon כְּא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> shall be as the light הַֽחַמָּ֔ה <S%H2535><s%> of the sun וְא֤וֹר <S%H216><s%> and the light הַֽחַמָּה֙ <S%H2535><s%> of the sun יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become שִׁבְעָתַ֔יִם <S%H7659><s%> shall be sevenfold כְּא֖וֹר <S%H216><s%> as the light שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> of seven הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days בְּי֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day חֲבֹ֤שׁ <S%H2280><s%> bindeth up יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֶׁ֣בֶר <S%H7667><s%> the breach עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people וּמַ֥חַץ <S%H4273><s%> the stroke מַכָּת֖וֹ <S%H4347><s%> of their wound יִרְפָּֽא׃ <S%H7495><s%> and healeth ס

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> Behold the name יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> cometh מִמֶּרְחָ֔ק <S%H4801><s%> from far בֹּעֵ֣ר <S%H1197><s%> burning אַפּ֔וֹ <S%H639><s%> [with] his anger וְכֹ֖בֶד <S%H3514><s%> [thereof is] heavy מַשָּׂאָ֑ה <S%H4858><s%> and the burden שְׂפָתָיו֙ <S%H8193><s%> his lips מָ֣לְאוּ <S%H4390><s%> are full זַ֔עַם <S%H2195><s%> of indignation וּלְשׁוֹנ֖וֹ <S%H3956><s%> and his tongue כְּאֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire אֹכָֽלֶת׃ <S%H398><s%> as a devouring

וְרוּח֞וֹ <S%H7307><s%> And his breath כְּנַ֤חַל <S%H5158><s%> stream שׁוֹטֵף֙ <S%H7857><s%> as an overflowing עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against צַוָּ֣אר <S%H6677><s%> of the neck יֶֽחֱצֶ֔ה <S%H2673><s%> shall reach to the midst לַהֲנָפָ֥ה <S%H5130><s%> to sift גוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations בְּנָ֣פַת <S%H5299><s%> with the sieve שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> of vanity וְרֶ֣סֶן <S%H7448><s%> and [there shall be] a bridle מַתְעֶ֔ה <S%H8582><s%> causing [them] to err עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and to in לְחָיֵ֥י <S%H3895><s%> in the jaws עַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> of the people

הַשִּׁיר֙ <S%H7892><s%> Ye shall have a song יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֔ם כְּלֵ֖יל <S%H3915><s%> as in the night הִתְקַדֶּשׁ־ <S%H6942><s%> is kept חָ֑ג <S%H2282><s%> solemnity וְשִׂמְחַ֣ת <S%H8057><s%> and gladness לֵבָ֗ב <S%H3824><s%> of heart כַּֽהוֹלֵךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> as when one goeth בֶּֽחָלִ֔יל <S%H2485><s%> with a pipe לָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come בְהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> into the mountain יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צ֥וּר <S%H6697><s%> to the mighty One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהִשְׁמִ֨יעַ <S%H8085><s%> to be heard יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ה֣וֹד <S%H1935><s%> shall cause his glorious קוֹל֗וֹ <S%H6963><s%> voice וְנַ֤חַת <S%H5183><s%> the lighting down זְרוֹעוֹ֙ <S%H2220><s%> of his arm יַרְאֶ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> and shall shew בְּזַ֣עַף <S%H2197><s%> with the indignation אַ֔ף <S%H639><s%> of [his] anger וְלַ֖הַב <S%H3851><s%> and [with] the flame אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire אוֹכֵלָ֑ה <S%H398><s%> of a devouring נֶ֥פֶץ <S%H5311><s%> [with] scattering וָזֶ֖רֶם <S%H2230><s%> and tempest וְאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> stones בָּרָֽד׃ <S%H1259><s%> hail

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> at מִקּ֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> For through the voice יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יֵחַ֣ת <S%H2865><s%> be beaten down אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> shall the Assyrian בַּשֵּׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> with a rod יַכֶּֽה׃ <S%H5221><s%> [which] smote

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> And [in] every place מַֽעֲבַר֙ <S%H4569><s%> shall pass מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> staff מֽוּסָדָ֔ה <S%H4145><s%> where the grounded אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Which יָנִ֤יחַ <S%H5117><s%> shall lay יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> on בְּתֻפִּ֖ים <S%H8596><s%> upon him [it] shall be with tabrets וּבְכִנֹּר֑וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and harps וּבְמִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <S%H4421><s%> and in battles תְּנוּפָ֖ה <S%H8573><s%> of shaking נִלְחַם־ <S%H3898><s%> will he fight [בָּהּ כ] (בָּֽם׃ ק)

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָר֤וּךְ <S%H6186><s%> [is] ordained מֵֽאֶתְמוּל֙ <S%H865><s%> of old תָּפְתֶּ֔ה <S%H8613><s%> For Tophet גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Indeed [הוּא כ] (הִ֛יא <S%H1931><s%> he ק) לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> yea for the king הוּכָ֖ן <S%H3559><s%> it is prepared הֶעְמִ֣יק <S%H6009><s%> he hath made [it] deep הִרְחִ֑ב <S%H7337><s%> [and] large מְדֻרָתָ֗הּ <S%H4071><s%> the pile אֵ֤שׁ <S%H784><s%> thereof [is] fire וְעֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> wood הַרְבֵּ֔ה <S%H7235><s%> and much נִשְׁמַ֤ת <S%H5397><s%> the breath יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּנַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> like a stream גָּפְרִ֔ית <S%H1614><s%> of brimstone בֹּעֲרָ֖ה <S%H1197><s%> doth kindle בָּֽהּ׃ ס
